about_the_game:
You met him from your birthday party, as one of your family members had hired him to entertain the crowd, however things go dark as you start to have nightmares about him and you end up in strange, unfamiliar places within them...

ClownScapades Rally is a stylized survival horror game which revolves around a protagonist who begins experiencing nightmares after encountering a clown named Clownie at a birthday party. In one of these dreams, the player wakes up in a sewer and embarks on a journey to explore its depths.
Unbeknownst to the player, they are reliving the past reality of a lost soul who once wandered into a similar scenario and met a tragic end. As the player navigates through the eerie environments, their objective is to release the trapped souls that reside within the depths of these nightmares.

ClownScapades Rally offers multiple game modes to keep players engaged. In Survival mode, players must endure random events and survive for a set amount of time. Escape mode challenges them to find an escape route by solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles. And Collect mode requires players to locate and gather various objectives scattered throughout the levels, delving deeper into the secrets of the game.

Throughout the game, players will encounter a cast of intriguing characters such as Clownie, Smoky, Berry, Jacky, and more! Each character holds their own enigmatic presence and their creations are even more mysterious.

Prepare yourself as you unveil the secrets of this game, and navigate through the atmospheric world of ClownScapades Rally.
